name: Giant Bombardier Beetle
description: The Giant Bombardier Beetle is a medium-sized insect known for its unique combat abilities, particularly its capability to spray fire. It has a robust build, with notable resilience and agility.
memorable: It can spray fire from a distance, catching enemies off guard.
goals: Primarily acts on instinct, exhibiting aggressive tendencies when threatened.
relations: May inhabit the same areas as other beasts or creatures that it could prey on or defend against.
environment: Typically found in natural environments where other beasts dwell.
strengths: Has good agility with a decent Dexterity score and resistance to fire damage.
weaknesses: Very low Intelligence and Charisma scores limit its cognitive abilities and social interactions.
attacks: Realizes threats with a bite and can spray fire from a distance, posing a dual threat.
most_powerful_ability: Its ability to spray fire deals significant ranged damage.
senses: Possesses blindsight out to 30 feet, granting it awareness of its surroundings without the need for sight.
test_queries: agile creature with ranged fire attack
beast with fire resistance and bite
surprising insect that can deal fire damage
